columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Keys that fully specifies the Provider Organisation providing a service to the client.

columns.name: episode_key
columns.dc:title: Episode Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each PMHC MDS episode. The Episode Key is unique and stable for each episode at the level of the organisation. This key must link to an existing episode within the PMHC MDS.

columns.name: twb_veteran
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Veteran
columns.schema:description: An indication of whether the client identifies as a veteran, as represented by a code.

columns.name: twb_sexual_orientation
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Sexual Orientation
columns.schema:description: Identifies how the client describes their sexual orientation, as represented by a code.

columns.name: twb_transgender_status
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Transgender Status
columns.schema:description: An indication of whether the client has a transgender history, experience or identity , as represented by a code.

columns.name: twb_intersex_status
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Intersex Status
columns.schema:description: An indication of whether the client has an intersex status, as represented by a code.

columns.name: twb_eligibility_type
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Eligibility Type
columns.schema:description: The criteria by which a client is assessed as being eligible for the Way Back Support service, as represented by a code.

columns.name: twb_external_evaluator_contact_consent
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - External Evaluator Contact Consent
columns.schema:description: The status of whether the client has consented to be contacted by external evaluators, as represented by a code.

columns.name: twb_primary_nominated_professional
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Primary Nominated Professional
columns.schema:description: Identifies the profession of the primary professional nominated by the client, as represented by a code.

columns.name: twb_primary_nominated_professional_consent_date
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Primary Nominated Professional Consent Date
columns.schema:description: The date that the client consented to having their Primary Nominated Professional contacted.

columns.name: twb_primary_nominated_professional_contact_entry_date
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Primary Nominated Professional Contact Entry Date
columns.schema:description: The date that the client's Primary Nominated Professional was contacted after entry.

columns.name: twb_primary_nominated_professional_contact_exit_date
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Primary Nominated Professional Contact Exit Date
columns.schema:description: The date that the client's Primary Nominated Professional was contacted after client's exit.

columns.name: twb_previous_suicide_attempts
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Previous suicide attempts
columns.schema:description: Indicates whether the client has attempted suicide prior to this episode, as represented by a code.

columns.name: twb_method_of_suicide_attempt
columns.dc:title: TWB Episode - Method of suicide attempt
columns.schema:description: Identifies the method of the most recent suicide attempt, as represented by a code.
